${ModID}:Breakdance.NAME: Breakdance
${ModID}:Breakdance.DESCRIPTION: {@@}{!Upgrades!|0=Ethereal. NL }The first time each turn you break ${ModID}:Dance, play the card that did so !M! additional time{!M!|>1=s}.

${ModID}:Airflare.NAME: Airflare
${ModID}:Airflare.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Deal !D! damage. If Attack ${ModID}:Follow-up, increase this card damage by ${ModID}:Dance this combat. {!Upgrades!|>0=Reshuffle.}

${ModID}:Chasse.NAME: Chassé
${ModID}:Chasse.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deals additional damage equal to !M! times your ${ModID}:Dance.

${ModID}:Enhappe.NAME: Échappé
${ModID}:Enhappe.DESCRIPTION: Play a{@@}{!Upgrades!|0= random} Attack in hand. NL Add a *Glisser{!Upgrades!|>0=+} to your discard pile. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Glisser.NAME: Glisser
${ModID}:Glisser.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Play a{@@}{!Upgrades!|0= random} Skill in hand. NL Add an *Échappé{!Upgrades!|>0=+} to your discard pile. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Floorwork.NAME: Floorwork
${ModID}:Floorwork.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL If Skill ${ModID}:Follow-up, deal !D! damage to ALL enemies again.

${ModID}:Intro.NAME: Intro
${ModID}:Intro.DESCRIPTION: {@@}{!Upgrades!|>0=Innate. NL }At the start of your turn, if you have no Attacks or Skills in hand, draw !M! card{!M!|>1=s} of each missing type.

${ModID}:Moonwalk.NAME: Moonwalk
${ModID}:Moonwalk.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL Draw an Attack.

${ModID}:Toprock.NAME: Toprock
${ModID}:Toprock.DESCRIPTION: Gain !${ModID}:M2! Vigor. NL If Power ${ModID}:Follow-up, gain !M! Strength.

${ModID}:Updraft.NAME: Updraft
${ModID}:Updraft.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw a Skill.

${ModID}:Waltz.NAME: Waltz
${ModID}:Waltz.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL ${ModID}:Modify a{@@}{!Upgrades!|0= random|>0=n} Attack in hand: "Deals additional damage equal to your ${ModID}:Dance."
